text: يَٰصَٰحِبَيِ ٱلسِّجۡنِ أَمَّآ أَحَدُكُمَا فَيَسۡقِي رَبَّهُۥ خَمۡرٗاۖ وَأَمَّا ٱلۡأٓخَرُ فَيُصۡلَبُ فَتَأۡكُلُ ٱلطَّيۡرُ مِن رَّأۡسِهِۦۚ قُضِيَ ٱلۡأَمۡرُ ٱلَّذِي فِيهِ تَسۡتَفۡتِيَانِ

translation.en: O two companions of prison, as for one of you, he will give drink to his master of wine; but as for the other, he will be crucified, and the birds will eat from his head. The matter has been decreed about which you both inquire
translation.id: Wahai kedua penghuni penjara, "Salah seorang di antara kamu, akan bertugas menyediakan minuman khamar bagi tuannya. Adapun yang seorang lagi dia akan disalib, lalu burung memakan sebagian kepalanya. Telah terjawab perkara yang kamu tanyakan (kepadaku)
